channel.description: The podcast that explores 'change that works' - and the people who make it happen.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Let's talk about change - with integrity.
channel.itunes:author: Petro Du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
channel.itunes:summary: Experienced change practioner, Petro du Pisani, explores 'change that works' and the people who make it happen.

item.author: onchange@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Petro du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Petro du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Riaan Wolmarans (BFF) | Travel books: Memories and aspirations
item.itunes:title: Riaan Wolmarans (BFF) | Travel books: Memories and aspirations
item.itunes:subtitle: Books we read about or while traveling, or that make us want to travel
item.description:
This is another special edition end-of-year book-review On Change podcast. In this episode Riaan Wolmarans and I talk about books about travel. Books that made us want to travel somewhere (or not). Books that we read, or were recommended to us while traveling. Books about places, real or invented. Join us on a journey around the world and through genres. We also reveal what we will be reading over the holiday season.


Connect with Petro on LinkedIn /petrodupisani


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.content:encoded:
This is another special edition end-of-year book-review On Change podcast. In this episode Riaan Wolmarans and I talk about books about travel. Books that made us want to travel somewhere (or not). Books that we read, or were recommended to us while traveling. Books about places, real or invented. Join us on a journey around the world and through genres. We also reveal what we will be reading over the holiday season.

item.itunes:keywords: Riaan Wolmarans, books, book review, travel books, travel, reading, Another Solid Gold Podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.author: onchange@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Petro du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Petro du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Jo Rust | How motorcycling around Africa changes you
item.itunes:title: Jo Rust | How motorcycling around Africa changes you
item.itunes:subtitle: Petro du Pisani speaks to Jo Rust about her amazing adventure around Africa
item.description:
"In this episode Petro speaks to Jo Rust, Personal Life Coach, Motorcycle adventurer and author of the book ""Woman Alone Around Africa."" Jo holds the record as the first woman to have circumnavigated the entire African continent on a motorcycle, solo. Jo is now studying psychology and is a practical life coach. This episode explores why Jo felt the need to ride around countries and continents on two wheels, and what she learnt about herself in the process."


Find out more about Jo Rust, or even book her as YOUR personal coach click here

Are you thinking of booking your own motorcycle tour? click here

Read Jo's blog of her adventure around Africa click here

Music Used : Sunny looks good on you, by Midnight North found at Youtube's Audio Library


Connect with Petro on LinkedIn /petrodupisani


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.itunes:summary:
"In this episode Petro speaks to Jo Rust, Personal Life Coach, Motorcycle adventurer and author of the book ""Woman Alone Around Africa."" Jo holds the record as the first woman to have circumnavigated the entire African continent on a motorcycle, solo.
Jo is now studying psychology and is a practical life coach.
This episode explores why Jo felt the need to ride around countries and continents on two wheels, and what she learnt about herself in the process."
Find out more about Jo Rust, or even book her as YOUR personal coach https://www.jorust.com/
Are you thinking of booking your own motorcycle tour? https://www.jorustadventures.com/

item.author: onchange@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Petro du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Petro du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Denis Beckett | On being an ordinary South African
item.itunes:title: Denis Beckett | On being an ordinary South African
item.itunes:subtitle: Journalist, TV presenter, radio host, author and activist Denis Beckett talks about being an ordinary person in South Africa
item.description:
In this episode Denis Beckett (journalist, adventurer, TV presenter, radio host and author) talks to host Petro du Pisani about his story and how life has changed for ordinary South African citizens over the years. We talk about his life as a journalist, writing, politics and reading newspapers, and in true Denis Beckett style we go off on a couple of tangents.


Extensive show notes, with links to content from this episode, are available at onchangeblog.tumblr.com


Find out more about making your own podcast at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.itunes:keywords: Denis Beckett, Journalist, Beckett's Trek, Frontline, Politics, #onchangepodcast, Another Solid Gold Podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Petro Du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Riaan Wolmarans | Dusting off the bookshelf
item.itunes:subtitle: Best friends Petro du Pisani and Riaan Wolmarans talk about the books they couldn't put down, the books they would read on holiday, books that shaped their lives, and much more.
item.description:
In this episode we take inspiration from a cartoon by Grant Snider and discuss books in twelve categories; those we couldn't pick up or put down. Books we lent each other. Books we thought were about one thing, then turned out to be about something different. Books that changed us and shaped us through the years.

Extensive show notes, with links to content from this episode, are available at SolidGoldStudios.co.za/onchange
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we take inspiration from a cartoon by Grant Snider and discuss books in twelve categories; those we couldn't pick up or put down. Books we lent each other. Books we thought were about one thing, then turned out to be about something different. Books that changed us and shaped us through the years.
item.itunes:keywords: Riaan Wolmarans, Tiso Blackstar, Star Trek, Kindle, Books, Reading list, Speculative Fiction, best friends, Petro du Pisani, change, IntegriChange, certified change practitioner, another Solid Gold Podcast Studios podcast, podcaststudios.co.za, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Petro Du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Steven Heyman | Yoga and enabling change through mindfulness
item.itunes:subtitle: How practicing yoga and mindfulness can make your mind more flexible and open to change.
item.description:
My guest is Steven Heyman (owner of Yogaworks), whose Vinyasa Flow class is a firm favourite of mine at The Yoga Republic. In this episode we explore how he went from being the managing director of a logistics company to becoming a yoga teacher. We also talk about the practice of mindfulness.

Extensive show notes, with links to content from this episode, are available at SolidGoldStudios.co.za/onchange
item.itunes:summary: My guest is Steven Heyman (owner of Yogaworks), whose Vinyasa Flow class is a firm favourite of mine at The Yoga Republic. In this episode we explore how he went from being the managing director of a logistics company to becoming a yoga teacher. We also talk about the practice of mindfulness.
item.itunes:keywords: Mindfulness, Yoga, Steven Heyman, Yogaworks, Yoga Republic, Petro du Pisani, change, IntegriChange, certified change practitioner, another Solid Gold Podcast Studios podcast, podcaststudios.co.za, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Petro Du Pisani | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Gail Cameron | Coaching and African Leadership
item.itunes:subtitle: How executive and life coaching has evolved over the past 30 years. Emotional Intelligence, Social Intelligence, Resonant Leadership and the Quantum Physics of Leadership.
item.description:
Petro du Pisani talks to Gail Cameron (MD of the Image Excellence Group) on how executive and life coaching has evolved over the past 30 years. They discuss excerpts from Gail's book "Authentic African Leadership," and touch on topics such as Emotional Intelligence, Social Intelligence, Resonant Leadership and the Quantum Physics of Leadership.

Extensive show notes, with links to content from this episode, are available at SolidGoldStudios.co.za/onchange
item.itunes:summary: Petro du Pisani talks to Gail Cameron (MD of the Image Excellence Group) on how executive and life coaching has evolved over the past 30 years. They discuss excerpts from Gail's book "Authentic African Leadership," and touch on topics such as Emotional Intelligence, Social Intelligence, Resonant Leadership and the Quantum Physics of Leadership.
item.itunes:keywords: Coaching, Authentic African Leadership, Gail Cameron, Image Excellence Group, Emotional Intelligence , Petro du Pisani, change, IntegriChange, certified change practitioner, another Solid Gold Podcast Studios podcast, podcaststudios.co.za, Gavin Kennedy
